Recommendations: review on the revised filing system of documents based on the new instrument of aaccup is strongly suggested
increase as much as possible the participation of students alumni and government representatives in the planning of the research agenda
increase the number faculty members who are engaged in conducting researches in line with their area of specialization
enhancement of the college of science research center must be given attention so that research culture could be established
provide flexible research incentives among faculty members especially those who are involved in researches
verification of signatories of documents must be given attention
formulation of clearcut policies that will provide specific sanctions to those who will violate the said policy ipr is advised
development of a committee to oversee the development and production of instructional materials may be considered

other forms of information dissemination of research output must be given attention these abstracts can also be published in the school paper so as to ensure the larger scope of circulation it is also suggested that a brochure flyers for every research undertaking be required
